categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Chonu was a male Jedi Master who served the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire, when he was stationed the space station Carrick Station.

The Operations Gear Vendor for the Jedi Knight class, Master Chonu was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel as part of Game Update 2.4 on October 1, 2013, along with the other Operations Gear Vendors. He was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
